data.comment: The match is underway in Monchengladbach.
Augsburg drives forward and Alfred Finnbogason gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 1, Throw-in high up the field for Augsburg in Monchengladbach.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
M´gladbach push upfield but Markus Schmidt quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 4, Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Florian Neuhaus gives M´gladbach a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of M´gladbach.
Markus Schmidt signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Markus Schmidt awards Augsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Augsburg to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
Markus Schmidt awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Augsburg push upfield and Rani Khedira gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert M´gladbach defence.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 17, M´gladbach's Florian Neuhaus is on target but unsuccessful.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
Patrick Herrmann of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Augsburg are coming forward and Daniel Caligiuri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 23, In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Monchengladbach M´gladbach's Lars Stindl is caught offside.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
In the minute 30, Markus Schmidt signals a Augsburg throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Markus Schmidt awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Breel Embolo (M´gladbach) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rani Khedira (Augsburg) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Matthias Ginter is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Matthias Ginter is back on the pitch.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Augsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 42, M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Lars Stindl for M´gladbach gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
In Monchengladbach, M´gladbach push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of M´gladbach.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Augsburg's Iago breaks free at Borussia-Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Markus Schmidt awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Monchengladbach.
The second half has started at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 46, Augsburg's Florian Niederlechner is whistled for offside at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 48, M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
M´gladbach's Florian Neuhaus misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Augsburg at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 50, In Monchengladbach, Hannes Wolf (M´gladbach) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Augsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Raphael Framberger is replacing Robert Gumny for Augsburg at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for Augsburg at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Breel Embolo for M´gladbach drives towards goal at Borussia-Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In Monchengladbach M´gladbach attack through Oscar Wendt. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 62, Raphael Framberger is booked for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In the minute 63, Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Borussia-Park, Jeffrey Gouweleeuw has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Heiko Herrlich is making the team's second substitution at Borussia-Park with Andre Hahn replacing Alfred Finnbogason.
Goal kick for Augsburg at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Florian Niederlechner with Michael Gregoritsch. This is the third substitution made today by Heiko Herrlich.
Raphael Framberger (Augsburg) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 67, Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a first substitution, with Valentino Lazaro replacing Patrick Herrmann.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Throw-in for Augsburg at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Augsburg's half?
Markus Schmidt awards Augsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Rani Khedira gets his shot on target but fails to score for Augsburg.
Tobias Strobl of Augsburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 75, Markus Schmidt signals a Augsburg throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
M´gladbach are caught offside.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Marcus Thuram is on a sub for Lars Stindl for M´gladbach.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Augsburg make their fourth substitution with Marco Richter replacing Ruben Vargas.
In the minute 84, M´gladbach's Breel Embolo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 87, Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Augsburg.
Goal! Daniel Caligiuri levels the match at 1-1.
Marco Rose is making the team's third substitution at Borussia-Park with Denis Zakaria replacing Florian Neuhaus.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
M´gladbach are pushing forward but Hannes Wolf's finish is wide of the goal.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Augsburg.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of M´gladbach.
Markus Schmidt blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Marcus Thuram for M´gladbach has been booked by Markus Schmidt and receives a first yellow card.
